data.text: @kombiz Can someone please let @MeghanMcCain know what actual data-driven science looks like, and that masks on the kids made a huge difference infection rates.

Anyhow, we did the right thing with mask mandates, ventilation, social distancing. It worked and kept a lot of people alive and a lot more healthy. The scientific consensus on mitigation was right. We will only get more research and the barringtonits will wear the badge of shame
